name: PDQM
goal:
Our principal goal is to support business including SME in the Czech Republic in several critical aspects: internal efficiency, data control and utilisation, efficient people-management and partnership with researchers that might support internal research and development.
PDQM supports both commercial organisations and universities with the effective organisation, IT utilisation and personal skills development and utilisation.
PDQM provides consultancy and expert support related to the IT, project management, team development and found management. There are experts in transferring both national and international law, methodologies and standards to the project and organisational conditions. We support both adoptions of the regulations, as well as project management accordingly to the EU rules and internal audits that controls if all obligations are adhered.
PDQM provides set of trainings, consultancy and coaching for IT and management related positions. In educational programmes we support development of an organisational culture and efficiency.
PDQM supports start-up business in the Czech Republic with all necessary steps from the company creation through the facility preparation up to the setting the organisational rules and build up a team culture.
Thanks to a good knowledge of both commercial and research sector, PDQM build up communication among partners and supports networking for new projects, research or production activities. The cooperated layers provide full support for contract management and partnership rules definition.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Education and training, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Participating in a public consultation - we've contributed to the open consultations on EU Research & Innovation programme
